author: jkeys0
name: Selene
description:
This is Selene, a GTK 3/2 theme, Gnome Shell theme and integrates with Unity.. now ported to Cinnamon!

NOTE: This was a quick port of the GNOME Shell version, so obviously it is not perfect yet, but it's getting there. I appreciate any fixes or improvements you can give :)

My first theme I really created on Linux.. so tell me how you like it!

This theme and whole artwork set was created by Trista, so please give all credit of her design skills to her.
